name: LifeboatFoundation-SafeguardingHumanityNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This Amazon Alexa flash briefing skill provides the latest news and blog post updates from the Lifeboat Foundation at lifeboat.com.

The Lifeboat Foundation is a nonprofit, nongovernmental organization dedicated to encouraging scientific advancements while helping humanity survive existential risks and the potential misuse of increasingly powerful technologies, including genetic engineering, nanotechnology, and artificial intelligence / robotics, as we move towards the Singularity.

The Lifeboat Foundation pursues a variety of programs, including helping to accelerate the development of technologies to defend humanity with new methods to combat viruses, effective nanotechnological defensive strategies, and even self-sustaining space colonies.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
